text: Jakariyale bhane, paravaradigara (palanakarta)! (Mero lagi) usako kunai nisani nirdharita gara. Allahale bhan'yo, nisani yo ho ki timi manisaharusita tina dinasam'ma sanketa baheka kura nagarnu. (Ti dinaharuma) timi badhibhanda badhi aphno palanakartako smarana garnu ra bihana beluka usaiko nama linegara
